resources.string: This service keeps Termux:API running in the background for faster startup of termux-* commands.
This app needs the following permission(s):\n

&TERMUX_API_APP_NAME; is a plugin app for the &TERMUX_APP_NAME; app that executes termux-api package commands. Check &TERMUX_APP_NAME; app github %1$s, &TERMUX_API_APP_NAME; app github %2$s and %3$s package github %4$s for more info.


The &TERMUX_API_APP_NAME; app requires `%3$s` apt package to function. Run `pkg install %3$s` to install it.


Note that if &TERMUX_API_APP_NAME; app crashes too many times, then android will mark the app as a bad process and you will need to manually start this activity again once for the api commands to start working again, otherwise the commands will hang.


Reports for some crashes may be shown when you restart &TERMUX_APP_NAME; app.
